resources.string: Tablet Lite
This application uses the USB tethering.\nFor details, please use the manual below.
● To use this application, the smartphone driver must be installed on your PC.
● The state smartphone is not connected to a PC, USB tethering is not activated.
● You need to install the PC-side program to connect your smartphone to a PC. Please download the program from the following site.
hanulc.wix.com/tablet
After finishing the setting, please press the start button. The description must click below.
How to Set Up
preparationActivity
padLeftActivity
padRightActivity
settingActivity
howActivity
Please enter the IP shown on your PC screen.
1. Connect your smartphone to a PC with USB, and turn on USB tethering on the smartphone.
2. Connect the network from pc to usb tethering.
Control Panel - Network and Internet - settings in the Network and Sharing Center (may vary depending on the Windows version, please disable the firewall during connection failures)
3. After running the PC -side program, lets you enter the IP address of the PC screen in the field of smart phones.
IP must be confirmed before the internet connection of a PC is connected to tethering your smartphone. (When not being connected to the tethering connection, you can unstable.)
Show advice
Initialize settings
initialization success!
helpActivity
ADVICE
This buton is the left mouse button click. You can take advantage of when draw.(mouse drag)
Server Connection Failed! Check the PC program running, and then re-run , please re-run the app. But the problem occurs, please re-run the PC.
Lite version is not available shortcuts.
If the application is updated, please also update the server program.
